tns:patch.author: cdolghier
tns:patch.description: creates utility read-only views only used by developers to aid in debugging AMP

script.lang: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_reports; CREATE VIEW v_reports AS SELECT ar.amp_report_id, ar.name AS report_name, ar.options AS report_options, ar.type AS report_type, arc.order_id AS order_id, ac.columnid, ac.columnname AS column_name FROM amp_reports ar JOIN amp_report_column arc ON arc.amp_report_id = ar.amp_report_id JOIN amp_columns ac on arc.columnid = ac.columnid ORDER BY ar.amp_report_id, arc.order_id
